title: eCommerce website - MERN Fullstack
description: Fully functional e-commerce website including pages from product listing to payment and admin area with CRUD functionality for users, products and orders. Authentication handled with JWT. Redux for state management.

screenshots.description: Homepage with navbar and hero element.
Homepage. Carousel with 3 top-rated products and general product listing.
Product detail page. Product description, review rating, price, stock status, quantity selector, add to cart button and review section.
Multiple products added to cart. Quantity selection and price updates.
Order summary including shipping address, payment method, order items, prices and total price.
Admin order edit. Mark as delivered.

title: Portfolio-Blog website
description: Developed with Next.js using Static Site Generation. Dynamic pages for projects and blog posts. Blog posts written in markdown and rendered with react-markdown. Framer motion for the "eye candy".

title: Shopware
description: Worked on the development of Shopware 6 and many other Shopware 5 and 6 projects for mid and large size B2B and B2C clients in Germany.

title: Next.js authentication using next-auth
description: Project built using next-auth library to handle authentication. SessionProvider, useSession, getSession, CredentialsProvider, JWT & bcryptjs (for password hashing), mongodb, HTTP requests sent using fetch.

title: Contact Keeper - MERN Fullstack
description: This is a MERN Fullstack project with authentication and CRUD functionality.

title: Message Logger App - MERN Fullstack
description: This is a MERN + Redux project with authentication and CRUD functionality. Functionalities: Add/delete logs & users; list logs/users

title: Blog
description: Blog posts written in markdown and rendered with "react-markdown". Notifications displayed via react portal through "_document.js.". Contact form using mongodb.

title: Resort website with room listing and filtering
description: Simple resort website with room listing and filter settings. Used react context API for state management and Contentful for content (image, text) delivery.
